review: This doesn't work with My Samsung Series 7 TV.  The USB connection interrupts with the other sources and any other HDMI connection is lost.  It also doesn't work with older tablets very well.  You need to have a tablet with 4.2 or better.  Apple IOS is also a little off.  It did work seamlessly with my Samsung S5 though.  If it weren't for the TV issue, I would love the product.  For now though it's sitting in a box collecting dust.
